mapper.insert: insert into icemanagement.space_reserve_records (user_id, space_id, reserve_time, duration, update_time,create_time, status) VALUES (#{userId},#{spaceId},#{reserveTime},#{duration},#{updateTime},#{createTime},#{status})
mapper.select: select s.space_name, u.name, u.sex, u.phone, u.id_number, rr.reserve_time, rr.duration, rr.create_time from icemanagement.space_reserve_records rr join icemanagement.user u on rr.user_id = u.id join icemanagement.space s on rr.space_id = s.id order by create_time DESC
